line.originaltext: 1 medium mango, peeled and finely diced
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
Stir together mango, strawberries, kiwi, jalapeno, mint, and rum in a glass bowl.
Stir together mango, strawberries, kiwi, jalapeno, mint, and rum in a glass bowl.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing12, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing13, "mass of fruit and peppers", "in the bowl")

line.originaltext: Stir together mango, strawberries, kiwi, jalapeno, mint, and rum in a glass bowl.
Stir together mango, strawberries, kiwi, jalapeno, mint, and rum in a glass bowl.
Refrigerate for 1 to 3 hours, stirring once or twice.
Refrigerate for 1 to 3 hours, stirring once or twice.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing14,"stir once or twice while in refrigerator")
